Posts.Content: Mar 10, 2015 06:04PM nancybel wrote: My hair also returned very curly. I had tighter curls in the back. My hairdresser colored, trimmed down the back and just a tad bit over the rest. Now I do it at home and then use one of those tiny flat irons, then finish with wax blast for spiky look and to smooth down the sides. It looks like a hair style. :) I still miss my long hair, but the fact that it looks like a style helps. :) I'll try and post a pic, if I can figure it out.
